means: 维持( sustain的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: America has enough firepower in the area to mount sustained air strikes.
sentence.Network_cn: 美国在该地区拥有足够的火力发动持续的空中打击。

sentence.Network_en: He sustained serious neck injuries after he broke someone's fall.
sentence.Network_cn: 有人坠落压在他身上，致使他颈部受重伤。

sentence.Network_en: He was sustained by the unflagging support of his family.
sentence.Network_cn: 他得到了家人不断的支持。

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...? Cleaning up the environment requires determined, sustained(持续的) efforts with clear targets and deadlines it neede.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... strained 不自然的，不友好的 sustained 持久的，经久不衰的 inclined 倾向于，赞成的.
sustained note 持续音sustained 持续不变的sustainer 支持者
applications of high molecular polymer in sustained - and controlled - release drug delivery systems ., 缓控释给药系统中高分子聚合物的应用.

list.abs: TOEIC词汇汇总 ... remind 提醒；使想起 19. sustain 维持；持续；支撑；蒙受 20. 1.alter 改变；修改 2.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... suspire 叹息，渴望 sustain 支撑；承受 sustenance 生活资料，粮食.
于是回归可持续（sustainable）本身，不只是生态环境的可持续，环保设计产品的功能性，新技术的可持续性，设计公司运行与发展 …
可持续性（SustainAbility）是一个领先的智囊团一年两次对可持续性报告的最佳实践进行评估。

entry.def: If you sustain something, you continue it or maintain it for a period of time.

example.ex: But he has sustained his fierce social conscience from young adulthood through old age...
example.tran: 而他从青年时期一直到老年都始终保持着强烈的社会良知。

example.ex: The parameters within which life can be sustained on Earth are extraordinarily narrow.
example.tran: 地球上生命可以存活下来的地域范围是非常狭小的。

entry.def: If you sustain something such as a defeat, loss, or injury, it happens to you.

example.ex: Every aircraft in there has sustained some damage...
example.tran: 那里的每架飞机都受到了一些损坏。

example.ex: A seventeen-year-old tourist died late last night of injuries sustained in yesterday's bomb blast.
example.tran: 一位 17 岁的游客在昨天的炸弹爆炸中受伤并于当天深夜身亡。

entry.def: If something sustains you, it supports you by giving you help, strength, or encouragement.

example.ex: The cash dividends they get from the cash crop would sustain them during the lean season...
example.tran: 从经济作物中获得的收益能帮助他们度过不景气的时期。

example.ex: I am sustained by letters of support and what people say to me in ordinary daily life...
example.tran: 这些支持的信件和人们每天对我的鼓励一直支撑着我。

means.word_mean: 1. maintained at length without interruption or weakening;

sentences.sentence: "heat transfer to the anode in free burning arcs"

Sentence.sentence: It cannot be sustained when friends move far apart.
In its 1994 report, the World Bank argued that the current pension system in most countries could not be sustained in the long term.
not be sustained in the long term

sentences.en: Bats are the only mammals to have wings and to achieve sustained flight.
sentences.cn: 蝙蝠是唯一的有翅膀且能持续飞行的哺乳动物。
